segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the sink, and she doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are about to cause a whole other mess, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching so far to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her turn, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how innocent they are, just wanting a little treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is kind of funny, but also a little scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before anything bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a sweet moment, even if it’s a little chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would notice them before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
